commits.author: Uwe Schindler
commits.sourceNew: /** Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if * none is found, reads the terms in field as floats and returns an array * of size reader.maxDoc() of the value each document * has in the given field. * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the floats. * @param setDocsWithField If true then {@link #getDocsWithField} will * also be computed and stored in the FieldCache. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public float[] getFloats (AtomicIndexReader reader, String field, boolean setDocsWithField) throws IOException;
commits.sourceOld: /** Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if * none is found, reads the terms in field as floats and returns an array * of size reader.maxDoc() of the value each document * has in the given field. * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the floats. * @param setDocsWithField If true then {@link #getDocsWithField} will * also be computed and stored in the FieldCache. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public float[] getFloats (IndexReader reader, String field, boolean setDocsWithField) throws IOException;
